entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.61.0
entry.content:
This release brings the ability for your users to recover their forgotten passwords, and stay logged in between browser sessions. The speed of the mesh analysis jobs has also roughly doubled, which makes detecting those holes a bit less expensive.

In order to enable password recovery, you'll need to set up email delivery, which needs a bunch of new environment variables:

Required:

  • PUBLIC_HOSTNAME: the public hostname (e.g. try.manyfold.app), used for links in emails
  • SMTP_SERVER: an SMTP server that can be used to send email
  • SMTP_USERNAME: username for the SMTP server
  • SMTP_PASSWORD: password for the SMTP server

Optional:

  • PUBLIC_PORT: if the service isn't on a standard port, specify it here. Also used for the links in the emails.
  • SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS: The email address that mail should be sent from. Defaults to notifications@{PUBLIC_HOSTNAME} if not specified.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add "remember me" option at login by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2027
  • Add ability to recover lost passwords by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2030

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Optimise STL loader by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2026

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.62.0
entry.content:
The features in this little release weren't on the roadmap; think of this as more of a weekend bonus! Images in a model are now shown in a carousel at the top of the page, with the individual 3d files further down. Also, the bulk editor doesn't include images any more (because they didn't have anything to edit).

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Show images in a carousel above models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2033

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.63.0
entry.content:
Another big feature release this time! Now you can convert inefficient STL and OBJ files to 3MF! For ASCII STLs, there's about a 95% space saving, and it's 50% for OBJ. So, if your disk is creaking at the seams, maybe some conversion is in order!

And, in order to see what's happening with conversions (and why they sometimes fail), there's now a nicer activity log which shows recent background jobs and what they've been doing.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Convert STL and OBJ files to 3MF by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2041
  • Add a friendly activity log showing background tasks and results by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2056

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.65.0
entry.content:
This release is all about improving accessibility after a recent audit. No new features as such, but if you're a screen reader or keyboard user you should find the site much easier to use. We now have skip links for large content blocks, proper tab ordering, better labels for links and buttons, and much more. We now use shape as well as colour to differentiate problem severity icons, which should help users with reduced colour vision.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix accessibility of upload page form labels by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2121
  • Add ARIA labels for pagination links by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2131
  • Fix tab ordering by moving sidebar later in DOM by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2138
  • Fix accessibility issues on image carousel by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2140

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Fix separate database env vars by @aneurinprice in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2116
  • A11y fixes for problem icons, including shape differentiation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2120
  • Move breadcrumbs into a top-level nav for better accessibility by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2122
  • Improve bulk editor accessibility by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2123
  • Polish translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2124
  • Add a skip link to get to main content by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2125
  • Add skip links for large content blocks (models, creators, collections, tags) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2129
  • Show constraints alongside password input boxes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2130
  • Translation updates for Polish and French by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2134
  • Improve labels on a number of links and buttons, for screen readers by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2135
  • Improve labelling of metadata and filters by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.64.0...v0.65.0
